description: Unique row identifier for this attribute entry; used as the primary key.
Reference to the attribute definition applied to the asset; links to the attribute master/list.
Recorded value for the attribute on this asset; units and type depend on the attributeâ€™s definition.
Target, threshold, or specification tied to the attribute value; often null when not applicable. Meaning may vary; confirm with SME.
Reference to the asset (vehicle/equipment) this attribute value belongs to; links to the asset master.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record, regardless of who made the change.
Timestamp capturing the last change initiated by a user session; may mirror the system last-modified time. Confirm usage with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this record for audit purposes.
Timestamp when the record was first created (often UTC); used for audit/history.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by a user (often UTC), for audit tracking.
